title: New Citi GPS Report Highlights the Vital Role of Corporate Treasury in a Rapidly Changing World
tag-1: New Citi GPS Report Highlights the Vital Role of Corporate Treasury in a Rapidly Changing World
tag-2: LONDON – Citi today released its new study - ‘Treasury Leadership: Does it Matter?’ highlighting the importance for companies to invest in Treasury.
tag-3: Treasurers face rising expectations from executive leadership as firms: navigate geopolitical and macroeconomic challenges, adopt new digital business models, and deploy emerging new technologies. Yet, as Treasurers deploy strategies to create value for their firms, they are challenged to justify their investments and queried how their treasury roadmaps benchmark with peers.
tag-4: Citi set out to answer three questions: Does leadership in treasury matter for a firm? What are the attributes of a leading treasury? What are the key steps needed to get there? Based on its Citi Treasury Diagnostics global benchmarking service, Citi completed a comprehensive study of almost 350 large corporate Treasury practitioners from a diverse set of industries and regions across the globe.
tag-5: The results are clear: Companies that nurture treasury teams to be leaders enjoy better financial performance. Citi estimates that the top 40 performing treasuries measured in the study may have generated up to $44bn of additional earnings over the last 5 years we attribute to their better treasury performance. Another indicator: Return on Invested Capital (ROIC) across study participants is 10% for those with a leading treasury vs.5.8% for companies that have a treasury classified as a laggard.
tag-6: “High-performing treasuries ensure efficient funding of working capital, proactively identify and mitigate financial risks, and deploy liquidity to fund the company's growth,” said Shahmir Khaliq, Global Head of Services, Citi, adding “Companies can use the learnings to leapfrog what can be a lengthy process of becoming treasury leaders. And by doing so, accelerate their ability to increase company returns.”
tag-7: Whilst effective Cash and Liquidity Management is a core function for Treasury, today’s report highlights that this area contains significant opportunities for improvement for companies in the aggregate.  The data shows many companies still struggling with the fundamentals - including complete cash visibility, robust cash forecasting, well-engineered liquidity structures to centralize cash, and high process automation. Meanwhile, leading treasuries are leaping forward, leveraging digitalization as a key enabler for core automation and to leverage data for insights towards more effective decision-making.
tag-8: “These results show that companies need to accelerate investments in treasury transformation,” said Stephen Randall, Global Head of Liquidity Management Services, Citi, adding “The good news is that the latest generation of technology-based financial services equips treasurers to automate, manage risk, and use insights to support business growth and contribute to financial outperformance.”

tag-10: About Citi Treasury Diagnostics and Survey Demographics
tag-11: Citi Treasury Diagnostics is an industry-leading service managed by Citi TTS Client Advisory. The service assists companies to benchmark their treasury vis a vis peers and obtain practical advice on prioritizing investments towards treasury leadership. This report was based on nearly 350 companies that participated in the Citi Treasury Diagnostics service. Participants ranged from below $2bn to greater than $100bn in annual sales and came from a diverse set of industries and locales across the globe.
